markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You evoke the spirit of the unicorn that donated the _alicorn lance's_ horn, which you ride in a shining charge. Move up to twice your Speed and make a Strike with the _alicorn lance_; you gain the effects of the lance's [jousting](/Traits.aspx?ID=186) trait on this Strike. If you were already mounted when you Activate the horn, the unicorn spirit takes shape around your steed, granting it a +10–foot status bonus to its Speed for the charge.
name: Interact (magical, necromancy)
